mameliya[sanskaranaya] mowunta roma sahitha samak atha.panchangulika gathra pihitayi.shwasanaya penahalu magini.purwa gathra apara gathra ha waligaya pahadiliwa wenwenwa handunagatha hakiya.hrudaya kutira 4ki.patawun bihikirima jalabuja hewath mawukusin bihikirima sidukere.atham kshirapayin andaja hewath biththara magin patawun bihikarayi.udaharana lesa platipasadakwiya haka.patawun kuda awadhiyedi mawagen kiri urabi wadethi.patawun wadiwiyata pathwana thuru mawa wisin rakabala ganiyi.kapala snayu yugala dolasaki.shakabhakshaka,manshabhakshaka ha sarwabhakshaka lesada bhojana ratawa anuwa handunagatha haka.mownge mukhaye dath pihita atha.bahira kan pihitayi.aැspiya sahitha as atha.awalathapiya.udaharana lesa balla,wandura,minisa,ashwaya,aliya dakwiyahaka.
